title: (Weds Full) Bobby Shares An Excerpt from His Kid’s Book  + Update On Amy’s $200 Video Game Bill Her Son Got
itunes:title: (Weds Full) Bobby Shares An Excerpt from His Kid’s Book  + Update On Amy’s $200 Video Game Bill Her Son Got
description:
Bobby shares an excerpt from the audio version of his kid’s book coming out in June. He tells us how he tried different voices for different animals and not sure if it worked. We get an update from Amy after she reached out to the company to dispute the bill her son accidently ran up on his video game.

See omnystudio.com/listener for privacy information.
